description:
Tsuna cannot move because of the damage he has taken. The Phantom Knight pursues him with his Armamento da Guerra, which he uses for special attacks, showing his devotion to Byakuran and his obsessive desire to accomplish his missions. The Phantom Knight tells Tsuna that it is useless to struggle, but hearing this, Tsuna desperately moves his injured body. Tsuna says that he will fight the Phantom Knight even having seen his strength. Tsuna quietly sets Operation X into action!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Une technique qui change la donne
